title: Istomino, Gorokhovetsky District, Vladimir Oblast
text:
Istomino () is a <a href="types%20of%20inhabited%20localities%20in%20Russia">rural locality</a> (a <a href="Village%23Russia">village</a>) in Fominskoye Rural Settlement, <a href="Gorokhovetsky%20District">Gorokhovetsky District</a>, <a href="Vladimir%20Oblast">Vladimir Oblast</a>, Russia. The population was 3 as of 2010.
Geography.
Istomino is located on the Visha River, 46 km southwest of <a href="Gorokhovets%2C%20Vladimir%20Oblast">Gorokhovets</a> (the district's administrative centre) by road. Rozhdestveno is the nearest rural locality.
